column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As for the pizza itself
column2: I was a big lover of the marina sauce. It had just the right amount of sweetness and acidity
column3: with larger chunks of tomato that cut through the fat of the cheese. I was not a huge fan of the sausage
column4: there was simply too much of it on the pizza and it became overwhelming. The crust also was nothing special. Overall it was yummy pizza
